storyList.PART_1: I'm feeling so burned out..! I need a break, and I really like the sound of your idea. Name's [name], by the way!
storyList.PART_2: It's so relaxing out here... I'm starting to feel less braindead already!
storyList.PART_3: This has been great, and I feel so much more stable now - I think I'm in the right headspace to get back to my passions. See you around!
storyList.PART_4: Hey! Great to see you again, and this place looks better than ever! Take a break if you're feeling tired though, okay? We can handle things here if you do!

storyList.PART_1: Hi, I'm... um... [name]! I'd like to come with you, if that's okay..!
storyList.PART_2: Sorry for the awkward introduction - I'm still getting used to saying '[name]' out loud... but it feels easier to do that here.
storyList.PART_3: It's been wonderful spending time around people who are so accepting of me; I'm feeling so much more confident about myself, knowing you all have my back!
storyList.PART_4: Hiiiii!! Guess who got their name officially changed on their passport today?!

storyList.PART_1: Are you serious? A Jam-making commune? Sounds amazing! I'm [name]
storyList.PART_2: I didn't know I'd find cooking Jam so enjoyable, I'm getting pretty good at it too!
storyList.PART_3: I've loved making Jam but I think I want to take this 'cooking' thing more seriously, I'm leaving to travel and learn new recipies!
storyList.PART_4: Thanks for the invite, it's great to see you again! I've learnt so much about cooking, you should let me make something for you sometime!

storyList.PART_1: Oh hey, I'm [name]. I'm not really a people-person but spending some time away from the city might be good for me.
storyList.PART_2: I've never been great at connecting with people but I've been chatting non-stop to [otherfriend] since I arrived! I've surprised myself!
storyList.PART_3: I've really enjoyed my time here, I never realised just how much I missed by keeping to myself all this time. I've decided to leave to try and reconnect with the wider world.
storyList.PART_4: It's great to see you! I've been doing really well. Sharing stories and experiences with others has become such a big part of my life now. I'd never have gotten here without your help!

storyList.PART_1: I'd be up for making some Jam! To be honest I could do with getting away from my family. I'm [name]!
storyList.PART_2: It's refreshing being around people who understand me, I don't know why my family found it so hard.
storyList.PART_3: It's been a tough decision but I think I need to go back and try one last time to get my family to understand. I didn't have the confidence before but I feel like I'm up to the task now.
storyList.PART_4: Hey, it's been a while huh? About my family...they didn't really get it, or even try to understand me, so I moved out for good. I realised that people like you are the family I should be holding onto.

storyList.PART_1: I'm sick of the hustle and bustle. I'm [name]
storyList.PART_2: It's much more peaceful out here...
storyList.PART_4: Partying is much better under a big sky!

storyList.PART_1: I can't stay in that house a moment longer. I'm [name]
storyList.PART_2: I finally feel a sense of freedom.
storyList.PART_3: I got a place near the river in a nearby town!
storyList.PART_4: It's nice to see my friends before I move to the next town.

storyList.PART_1: My parents don't understand why this matters so much to me. I'm [name]
storyList.PART_2: I've made a new family here at the commune.
storyList.PART_3: Me and [otherfriend] are moving in together!
storyList.PART_4: I'm so excited to live with someone likeminded.

storyList.PART_1: I feel like I'm not contributing, working at a dead-end job all day. I'm [name].
storyList.PART_2: Working together to make things with my hands feels so rewarding!
storyList.PART_4: I can't believe how much jam we made together!

storyList.PART_1: Hello! I'm [name]! I just quit my job
storyList.PART_2: Have you spoken to [otherfriend]? They are really cool! We've been bonding over our shared experiences
storyList.PART_3: This was amazing! I'll never forget the friends I made here. I'm off to travel the world!
storyList.PART_4: Hoi! Bonjour! Ola! I learned so much in my travels
